list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He lives not far from here
Here is / Here’s your lost book.

list_definition.definition: at this time; at this point in an argument

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Here she stopped speaking to wipe her eyes
Here is where I disagree with you.
My colleague here will deal with the matter.

list_definition.definition: a shout of surprise, disapproval etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Here! What do you think you’re doing?

list_definition.definition: a shout used to show that one is present

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Shout ‘Here!’ when I call your name.

list_definition.definition: in, or to, a larger number of places; in all directions

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: People were running around here, there and everywhere.
